long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ordemio let's you add any LinkedIn profile, LinkedIn search result directly to your Ordemio account.

Our extension makes it easy to add contacts from LinkedIn to your personal Ordemio account.
- Go to any person's profile on LinkedIn.
- Open the Ordemio Extension.
- All data will automatically be displayed in full form so you can add the contact to your Ordemio account.
